Title: Local Flavors
Description:
Now that we have the base o' the brew figured out, we need tae add the spice.

Put that rudimentary Winterpelt I taught ye tae use and ask around for local ingredients tae blend into the flavor profile. Try talkin' with Kazzi. From what I gather she's somethin' of a trader. 

The finished brew will be a mix of dwarven and Winterpelt traditions which seems appropriate for the circumstances.

An' if we're lucky, it won't taste half bad!
ObjectivesText: Ask Kazzi for ingredients to flavor the brew.
